UBIK nudi jedinstvenu kombinaciju mogućn: UBIK offers a unique combination of educational opportunities, community engagement, and networking within the local blockchain and crypto world.
Kao član, imat ćete pristup informativni: As a member, you will have access to informative workshops, meetings, and exclusive groups to navigate through the small but complex blockchain and crypto ecosystem. UBIK provides a comfortable environment for individuals from different social spheres. Every active UBIK member is entitled to free consultation on all matters related to blockchain and cryptocurrencies within reasonable limits.
Nadalje, UBIK kontinuirano radi na promo: Furthermore, UBIK continuously promotes blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies and actively engages in education and dialogue with regulators, corporations, banks, and similar ecosystem participants. Among other benefits, you also receive significant discounts on all UBIK commercial projects.
